description: Change of use of the first floor from Class E (Commercial, business and service) to Class C3 (residential) to provide three self contained units including a part one, part two storey rear infill extension, a first floor rear extension, a first floor rear extension to house new plant equipment, conversion of loft space involving a dormer extension at rear, installation of solar panels to rear flat roof, removal of a rear/flank chimney, provision of rear external access stairs, cycle and refuse stores, alterations to all fenestrations and ground floor internal commercial floorspace layout changes.
